Lyrics                                   : [00:09.92]Mmm / [00:14.92]There's a hero / [00:19.55]If you look inside your heart / [00:23.47]You don't have to be afraid / [00:26.79]Of what you are / [00:30.78]There's an answer / [00:35.57]If you reach into your soul / [00:39.71]And the sorrow that you know / [00:42.92]Will melt away / [00:49.35]And then a hero comes along / [00:53.50]With the strength to carry on / [00:57.62]And you cast your fears aside / [01:01.80]And you know you can survive / [01:05.51]So, when you feel like hope is gone / [01:09.57]Look inside you and be strong / [01:13.70]And you'll finally see the truth / [01:17.27]That a hero lies in you / [01:27.48]It's a long road / [01:31.57]When you face the world alone / [01:35.68]No one reaches out a hand / [01:38.96]For you to hold / [01:43.47]You can find love / [01:47.69]If you search within yourself / [01:51.66]And that emptiness you felt / [01:54.75]Will disappear / [02:01.23]And then a hero comes along / [02:05.56]With the strength to carry on / [02:09.63]And you cast your fears aside / [02:13.52]And you know you can survive / [02:17.43]So when you feel like hope is gone / [02:21.60]Look inside you and be strong / [02:25.62]And you'll finally see the truth / [02:29.71]That a hero lies in you / [02:33.95]Oh, oh, Lord knows / [02:41.06]Dreams are hard to follow / [02:44.92]But don't let anyone / [02:48.05]Tear them away / [02:52.86]Hold on / [02:56.91]There will be tomorrow / [03:01.24]In time you'll find the way, hey / [03:09.76]And then a hero comes along / [03:14.08]With the strength to carry on / [03:18.00]And you cast your fears aside / [03:21.84]And you know you can survive / [03:25.76]So when you feel like hope is gone / [03:29.99]Look inside you and be strong / [03:33.93]And you'll finally see the truth / [03:37.61]That a hero lies in you / [03:45.82]That a hero lies in you / [03:59.54]Mmm, that a hero lies in you
